Uses of Package
fr.sorbonne_u.cps.dht_mapreduce.interfaces.content

  • Packages that use fr.sorbonne_u.cps.dht_mapreduce.interfaces.content 
    Package Description
    fr.sorbonne_u.cps.dht_mapreduce.interfaces.content
    Java interfaces for data managed in the DHT/MapReduce project.
    fr.sorbonne_u.cps.dht_mapreduce.interfaces.endpoints
    Java interfaces used to describe end points of content nodes of the DHT in the DHT/MapReduce project.
    fr.sorbonne_u.cps.dht_mapreduce.interfaces.frontend
    Interfaces used in the front end of the DHT.
    fr.sorbonne_u.cps.dht_mapreduce.interfaces.management
    Java interfaces and component interfaces used in the content nodes of the DHT in the DHT/MapReduce project.
    fr.sorbonne_u.cps.mapreduce.endpoints  
  • Classes in fr.sorbonne_u.cps.dht_mapreduce.interfaces.content used by fr.sorbonne_u.cps.dht_mapreduce.interfaces.content 
    Class and Description
    ContentAccessI
    The interface ContentAccessI defines the methods used in the DHT nodes to asynchronously access the content of the DHT.
    ContentAccessSyncCI
    The component interface ContentManagementCI defines the services provided by the DHT nodes to manage the content of the DHT.
    ContentAccessSyncI
    The interface ContentAccessSyncI defines the signatures of services used in the DHT nodes to access the content of the DHT stored in the receiving node or one of its follower in the DHT ring.
    ContentDataI
    The interface ContentDataI defines a standard protocol to access data put in the DHT to write map/reduce functions; it must be implemented by all data classes that define data to be put in the DHT.
    ContentKeyI
    The interface ContentKeyI must be implemented by all classes that define keys to be put in the DHT Description As in any hash table, distributed hash tables store key-value pairs.
    ResultReceptionCI
    The component interface ResultReceptionCI declares the method offered by a caller component to receive the result of a previously launched asynchronous computation.
    ResultReceptionI
    The interface ResultReceptionI declares the method to be implemented by a caller component to receive the result of a previously launched asynchronous computation.
  • Classes in fr.sorbonne_u.cps.dht_mapreduce.interfaces.content used by fr.sorbonne_u.cps.dht_mapreduce.interfaces.endpoints 
    Class and Description
    ContentAccessCI
    The component interface ContentManagementCI defines the services provided by the DHT nodes to manage the content of the DHT.
    ContentAccessSyncI
    The interface ContentAccessSyncI defines the signatures of services used in the DHT nodes to access the content of the DHT stored in the receiving node or one of its follower in the DHT ring.
  • Classes in fr.sorbonne_u.cps.dht_mapreduce.interfaces.content used by fr.sorbonne_u.cps.dht_mapreduce.interfaces.frontend 
    Class and Description
    ContentDataI
    The interface ContentDataI defines a standard protocol to access data put in the DHT to write map/reduce functions; it must be implemented by all data classes that define data to be put in the DHT.
    ContentKeyI
    The interface ContentKeyI must be implemented by all classes that define keys to be put in the DHT Description As in any hash table, distributed hash tables store key-value pairs.
  • Classes in fr.sorbonne_u.cps.dht_mapreduce.interfaces.content used by fr.sorbonne_u.cps.dht_mapreduce.interfaces.management 
    Class and Description
    ContentAccessCI
    The component interface ContentManagementCI defines the services provided by the DHT nodes to manage the content of the DHT.
    ResultReceptionCI
    The component interface ResultReceptionCI declares the method offered by a caller component to receive the result of a previously launched asynchronous computation.
  • Classes in fr.sorbonne_u.cps.dht_mapreduce.interfaces.content used by fr.sorbonne_u.cps.mapreduce.endpoints 
    Class and Description
